title: Discord Music Bot with Java
desc: This is a simple discord bot that allows users to request songs on YouTube and Spotify to be played in my local discord server.
alt: Thumbnail of discord bot source code

title: Interfaces and Abstract Classes in Java
desc: In my object-oriented programming class, we covered Interfaces and Abstract Classes to learn about polymorphism.
alt: Thumbnail of lab 6 code from object oriented

title: Compound Interest Calculator
desc: For my final project, I decided to make a GUI Compound Interest Calculator. This program uses the Java AWT framework and allows users to customize principle, interest rate, and monthly contributions.

title: Trip Collage iOS App
desc: I made this application during my freshman year of college by referencing Apple's Documentation. This uses Apple Map's API to show where the events where my friends and I have went
alt: Thumbnail of Trip Collage iOS App

title: Leetcode Algorithm Techniques in Python
desc: Preparing for interviews for internships in software development, I started to work on various algorithms. These are simple examples of various sorting and searching algorithms.
alt: Thumbnail of Leetcode Algorithm Techniques in Python

title: MySQL Final Project
desc: We took the approach as a Database Administrator at a startup called Amazon and had to create the database for them. This includes a Sales table, Products table, and Customers table.
alt: Thumbnail of Database Administration MySQL Final Project
